item.description:
The Tour de Cure, is a Charity Ride for Diabetes.  They offer a 15, 30, 65 Metric Century, & 100 mile option.  I plan to do the 30 or the 65.  Probably the 65.  You can select your Ride, the day of the Event.  For more info, Click the Link Below.  There should be at least  100 Riders, in each Mileage Option.   I am told, one of our Members, is doing the 100 Mile Option !!!

 

http://main.diabetes.org/site/TR/TourdeCure/EasternNewEnglandArea?pg=entry&fr_id=8029

 

 

Click, the Link below, to Sign-Up.  Team Name:  Rhode Warriors.  Registration is only $ 25., with a Fund Raising Goal of  $ 150.

https://donations.diabetes.org/site/TRR/TourdeCure/EasternNewEnglandArea?fr_id=8029&pg=tfind&JServSessionIdr004=lo6xrnad64.app215a

This is what you get for your Registration:

You get Breakfast & Lunch & Rest Stops, along the way.  There are also service vehicles (SAGs ), in the event you breakdown. They also have Bike Mechanics, should you need one. This does not mean, that you should show-up, with a Bike that is not in Riding Shape.

At the Finish Line, in addition to Lunch, a Band will be Playing, ( either the Rolling Stones or U-2, or was it Aerosmith ??)  plus you can get a  Massage !!!!

Any Questions, please Post them on the comment section.  I will be offering Training Rides, thru out the Month of May.  Yes, I need some Training.
item.name: Tour de Cure, 15, 30, Metric Century ( 65) or 100 Miles
